Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text:
Very cozy restaurant - great food, great athmosphere, relaxing music. Service was good.
Food was delightful - we took daily and truffle risotto and a bunch of desserts. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: super delicious foods., price is goed., cool ambiance, great place in the center of Amsterdam

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Elegant and trendy place. The ambiance and location is very nice. Great place to start your evening with some very tasty and original cocktails.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Great atmosphere and tasty food, but very small portions and outrageous prices. For example, a ‚Ç¨12 bottle of wine in the supermarket costs ‚Ç¨27 here (we know the brand) and whilst the gnocchi was very tasty it was not enough for the prices ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The spacious inside was pretty empty on a Tuesday evening (happy hour at least) however the outdoor patio was pretty full for an unseasonably warm October evening. Very satisfying environment and menu for our group with basics such as beer, ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: This was an exquisit experience. I wanted to go to a special place my last night in Amsterdam and this place was on point. I loved the open kitchen and the chance to watch the staff creating delicious dishes.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The food , the local and atmosphere 5 stars. Service good. Beverage, ok. Little beer choises. Was a little cold. Not cheap, but not super expensive.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Nice food and vibe.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The meal and service was absolutely amazing, and the presentation of the food was spectacular! I could not recommend this restaurant more highly!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Very fancy atmosphere and friendly staff. We just had drinks here and also received flavored water without asking for it, which was a nice touch.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Delicated foods made of prime material. Friendly services. Good value.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Tourist trap. Very fancy and expensive restaurant, but the food is average and the service extremly slow and confused.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Admittedly top of the top best lounge bar in Amsterdam. I love to be back there

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Good food., Ask for the rissotto is amazing. Buuuut the service is very slow

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The taste of the dishes was very clean and fresh! Perfectly seasoned Salamon and cookies to perfection! Nice atmosfere

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Fantastic food - pity about the service. Best seafood salad I have ever had. Nice wine list. Why water can't be brought in a jug rather than constantly having to look for refills bewilders me. This is a total no brainer! Drinks service v slow. My main course was nearly finished when the wine came. Pity, because the food here is superb

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Delicious food and one of the best long island's I've had in a long time.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Beautiful vibes! Awesome cocktails! Cocktails üçπ I went with a few colleagues and we sat there for a couple hours talking over the next rounds. Service was a bit slow, but their tapas are pretty good especially the fried balls.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The food was okay. Unfortunately there weren‚Äôt many vegetarian or vegan options on the menu. The staff lacked attention and was not confident when speaking English. They charge you 4,5 ‚Ç¨ for bread, at least if you‚Äôre a tourist I guess.

Good: location, you can sit outside and inside. Large windows provide a nice ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Really good cocktail, we try with lemon meringue and gold-digger and we loved both.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Food wise, this place is EXPENSIVE. The service is typically Dutch, ie, slow and without any charm. The food quality is not bad, but I cannot fathom how they can justify their price tag. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text:
Horrible choice! - I would give you 0 stars if I could.

I picked this place for my 40th birthday, which was on 12/21. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The atmosphere is nice and the food is ok, the staff is friendly but we had to wait for more than 30 min between starter and main course. The wait totally killed the experience of a good dinner.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Flavor that is outstanding and service that is truly wonderful.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: I love the over-the-top interior. Go on a weekday (because less crowded) and sit by the big plate glass window inside for watching the Rembrandtplein action. It's a huge barn of a space with a corporate-y vibe, and the beer list is tiny, ‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Unbelievable how long one has to wait for ordering a drink. Staff is friendly and speaks Dutch. Tips are earned due to excellent service: come to London and learn how.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: 40 min of waiting for 5 drinks‚Ä¶

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Excellent food and great location!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Good food with fast&friendly service what more you can ask

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Good service. Very good food.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Very tasty pasta with shrimp. Cream-butter sauce with a few sundried tomatoes and pine nuts. Served hot. Great place to sit outside and eat a casual but well-cooked meal.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text:
Great atmosphere, and even though the place was packed, service was very attentive.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: On a slow night we still had to wait 20 min before someone took our order.  I was sent away by the bar tender when I was tired of waiting with a statement that someone would come to us.  So we had to wait for another 5min. Terrible service!!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The place looks very nice. The staff was a bit below expectation. The food was nice. I recommend the truffle risotto with parmesan. ‚ú®

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: We ordered steak and risotto, which came fast and were really tasty. It was a bit expensive but you pay for the view as well. Recommended!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Located at the Rembrandt square it's one of the big restaurants there. I can't say I was impressed by te food. Had a Black Angus steak which wasn't really big. The presentation of the food was nice but it wasn't worth the price.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Loved this place. Great staff and lovely atmosphere :)

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: A nice fancy restaurant with quality music, service and food! I only wouldn't recommend you to take the Panini, because I was a little bit dissapointed that the Panini I ordere looked like a 'normal' cheese sandwich. I would really recommend people to try "Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn" for a nice lunch (or dinner) !

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Can't take a simple order. They don't know the difference between a red and a white wine! Trying too hard on the high class image to actually provide high class service...

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The place looks so nice and large! Much better than name suggests! I loved its music, spatiousness, paintings on the wall, light show, cocktails, decorations. Extra!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Top quality food which you wouldn't expect because of the touristic location but once you get inside you just love it!!!

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: The location of this restaurant is great. The staff was very friendly, and the set menu had some good offerings. It was fine dining, but not so fine that the meal comes in unrecognizable forms. Worth a stop.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: Large vibrant restaurant with excellent food. Mowers atmosphere and skillful staff. This is a great place for both a couples night out and for larger parties.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
Review Text: High ceilings make for a nice atmosphere. Music isn't too loud, service was prompt and prices are reasonable for the location.

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn

Name: Kitchen & Bar Van Rijn
